price: 21. Arba negi jie paėmė (garbinimui) aliha (dievus) iš žemės, kuri prikelia mirusius?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
